SEARCH
Package BE

Class InquiryManager

java.lang.Object
BE.InquiryManager
public class InquiryManager extends Object
Manages inquiries made by users, storing and retrieving them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InquiryManager()
    Constructs an InquiryManager with an empty list of inquiries.

      public void storeInquiries(Inquiry inquiry)

    • getInquiriesForUser

      public ArrayList<Inquiry> getInquiriesForUser(User user)
      Retrieves inquiries made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose inquiries are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing inquiries made by the specified user.

    • getAllInquiries

      public ArrayList<Inquiry> getAllInquiries()
      Retrieves all inquiries stored in the InquiryManager.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all stored inquiries.

    • updateInquiry

      public void updateInquiry(Student student, Inquiry oldInquiry, String newMessage)
      Updates an inquiry's message for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose inquiry is to be updated.
      oldInquiry - The inquiry to be updated.
      newMessage - The new message to replace the old message.

    • LoadInquiries

      public ArrayList<Inquiry> LoadInquiries(ArrayList<Inquiry> loadInquiries)
      Loads a list of inquiries into the InquiryManager.
      Parameters:
      loadInquiries - The inquiries to load into the InquiryManager.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of inquiries loaded into the InquiryManager.
